minijava.showNameProduct.description: The name product for a MiniJava file shows a depiction of the name analysis information computed by the MiniJava compiler when compiling that file. When this setting is on and a name product is published, display it in an editor.

minijava.showOutlineProduct.description: The outline product for a MiniJava file shows a code outline in source form computed by the MiniJava compiler when compiling that file. When this setting is on and an outline product is published, display it in an editor.

minijava.showSourceProduct.description: The source product for a MiniJava file shows a pretty-printed version of the source abstract syntax tree used by the MiniJava compiler when compiling that file. When this setting is on and a source product is published, display it in an editor.

minijava.showSourceTreeProduct.description: The source tree product for a MiniJava file shows the source abstract syntax tree used by the MiniJava compiler when compiling that file. When this setting is on and a source tree product is published, display it in an editor.

minijava.showTargetProduct.description: The target product for a MiniJava file shows a pretty-printed version of the abstract syntax tree of the JVM bytecode produced by the MiniJava compiler when compiling that file. When this setting is on and a target product is published, display it in an editor.

minijava.showTargetTreeProduct.description: The target tree product for a MiniJava file shows the abstract syntax tree of the JVM bytecode produced by the MiniJava compiler when compiling that file. When this setting is on and a target tree product is published, display it in an editor.
